item.title: 1022 CTSH
item.description: score:1022 Chances: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp has been making waves in the stock market, with a high GF Score of 93 out of 100, indicating the highest outperformance potential. On August 3, 2023, Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp saw a 5.49% gain, reaching a stock price of $68.

item.title: 1038 MPW
item.description: score:1038 Chances: Medical Properties Trust (MPW) is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that invests in hospitals, which could benefit from the potential recovery in the healthcare sector post-pandemic. Investors seeking high dividend yields may consider Medical Properties Trust (MPW), as it currently offers a dividend yield of about 11.

item.title: 0956 JNJ
item.description: score:956 Chances: Johnson & Johnson is part of the Zacks top Analyst Blog, which could attract investor attention. JNJ is a longtime dividend payer and has earned the title of Dividend King, making it attractive to income-focused investors. The company’s involvement in appealing court appeals regarding talc-related claims may provide positive outcomes.
